channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [CXF-7973] Add NPE guard for jetty and undertow threads configuration in blueprint (to prevent NPE during karaf-quickstart/../Keycloak-cxf quickstarts)
item.description:
Run quickstart security/keycloak/keycloak-cxf according to README.md

Bundle deployment fails with following error:

2019-02-14 10:50:53,707 | ERROR | .3.0.redhat-SNAPSHOT | o.a.a.b.c.BlueprintContainerImpl | 51 - org.apache.aries.blueprint.core - 1.9.0 | Unable to start blueprint container for bundle keycloak-cxf/7.3.0.redhat-SNAPSHOT
org.osgi.service.blueprint.container.ComponentDefinitionException: Unable to initialize bean kc-cxf-endpoint-config
	at org.apache.aries.blueprint.container.BeanRecipe.runBeanProcInit(BeanRecipe.java:593) ~[51:org.apache.aries.blueprint.core:1.9.0]

item.summary: Add NPE guard for jetty and undertow threads configuration in blueprint (to prevent NPE during karaf-quickstart/../Keycloak-cxf quickstarts)

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: patch applied on behalf of jondruse with thanks!
